# Python
*.pyc
__pycache__/
*.pyo
*.pyd
*.egg-info/
*.so

# Virtual environment
.venv/
env/
venv/

# Build artifacts
dist/
build/
*.egg
*.manifest
*.spec

# Logs and debug files
logs/
*.log
*.out
*.err

# Coverage reports
.coverage
.coverage.*
htmlcov/
coverage.xml

# Test cache and artifacts
.pytest_cache/
.tox/
noxfile.py
nox/
hypothesis/

# IDE and editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*.bak

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Poetry and Pip files (if you don't want to track lock files)
poetry.lock
pip-log.txt

# Cast recording file
demo.cast
